fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the night, guess a player's role. If you're correct, gain 1 point. If you're incorrect, lose 3 points.
- During the day, predict some person's next night target. You can also choose to guess that they do nothing/don't visit anyone. If you're correct, gain 3 points. Even if they target multiple people, you just need to get one target right.
- During the night, guess who gets **hanged** next day. You can also guess no hang/nightfall. If you're correct, gain 4 points. If you're incorrect, lose 1 point.
- During the day, guess that some person will die next night. If you're correct, gain 3 points.
- At any time, you may guess that the game will end next phase. If you're correct, gain 10 points. Incorrect, and you lose 2.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask __and__ self-target.
- __You may only use each of your abilities on any specific player **once**.__ To clarify, you can use any of your abilities multiple times, but you can't target the same person with the same ability more than once. No guessing the same person's role every night.
- You start with three points and you'll **die** if you go below zero.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get 20 points. You can win after the game ends.
